sentences.en: Affectations of manner and speech are mere frippery.
sentences.cn: 态度和语言的做作只是俗丽服饰而已.

sentences.en: Affections of manner and speech are mere frippery.
sentences.cn: 态度和语言的做作只是矫饰而已.

sentences.en: She often wears ornaments of frippery.
sentences.cn: 她常戴些低俗的装饰品.

words.tran_cn: 无用的东西；便宜而俗艳的服装

trans.tran_cn: 便宜而俗艳的服装，无用的东西
trans.tran_en: an unnecessary and useless object or decoration
